title: cyRespond to a property possession claim online
description:
cyThere’s no fee to respond to a claim. You must respond within 14 days of receiving the claim pack in the post.

cyThis service is also available in English.
saveDraftInfo: cyYou can save your response as a draft and return to it later. You’ll be able to review and edit your answers before you submit them.
uploadDocumentsInfo: cyAfter you finish answering the questions, you can upload any documents to support your response.
claimantVisibilityInfo: cyThe claimant will be able to see any documents you upload and your answers.
provideDetailsInfo: cyYou’ll be asked to provide or confirm details, such as:
listItemDependants: cyany dependants (people you look after financially)
listItemCircumstances: cyyour circumstances and any exceptional hardship you’d experience if you had to leave your home
shareDetailsInfo: cyYou can also share details about:
financialSituationInfo: cyYou do not have to answer questions about your financial situation, but sharing this information can help a judge understand your circumstances.
hmctsSupportInfo: cyIf you need support to use HMCTS services, like step-free access to a court for your hearing, you can either request this as part of your response, or at a later time.
